docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

methods.name: update

apis.short_description: Mettre à jour un système d'exploitation

params.name: os_parameters_attributes
params.description: Paramètres du système d’exploitation (tableau ou hash indexé)
params.validator: Must be an Array of nested elements

params.name: password_hash
params.description: La fonction de hachage à utiliser pour le mot de passe root. Les fonctions possibles : MD5, SHA256, SHA512, Base64

params.name: architecture_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: config_template_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: provisioning_template_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: medium_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: ptable_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

examples:
PUT /api/operatingsystems/1073012828-RHEL%206-1
{
  "operatingsystem": {
    "name": "new_name"
  }
}
200
